entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adding custom events does not work as expected in Blazor #56458
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #56454
  • ValidateOnStart doesn't validate Options on startup #56453
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/2.1` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #56452
  • Skipped all of Templates.Mvc.Tests in Helix on Debian12 and Mariner #56450
  • End of message callback for connections #56449
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi should allow overriding the schema for specific types #56448
  • .NET 8 Blazor form processing with action to Razor Components Page with static SSR #56445
  • Quarantine CacheTagHelper_VaryByCultureComposesWithOtherVaryByOptions #56440
  • Investigate perf improvements for ProblemDetailsService interactions in #56439
    Backlog

Closed

  • Perf regression: json, multiple_queries, single_query #56430
  • <details><summary>Details</summary> #56451
  • Blazor projects won't load on .NET 9 Preview 5 #56438
  • Blazor app doesn't work with older browsers #56432
  • The Blazor Web App template in .Net 8 RC2 does not offer equivalent functionality to the previous Blazor hosted WASM template #51281
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Skipping RazorViews_AreUpdatedOnChange/RazorPages_AreUpdatedOnChange #56322
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #56431
  • [9.0-preview.5] Endpoint with nullable parameter no longer generates code with Request Delegate Generator #55840
  • Use IProblemDetailsService in ValidationProblem #47631

PullRequests

Created

  • Annotate SignalR server for native AOT #56460
    area-signalr
  • [release/8.0] Chain runtime .Msi's instead of .Exe's in hosting bundle #56459
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Update azure-pipelines-mirror-within-azdo.yml for 8.0 #56457
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Update azure-pipelines-mirror-within-azdo.yml for 8.0 #56456
    area-infrastructure
  • Only enable SwaggerUI in development #56455
    area-grpc
  • Use UtcNowParameterKey constant to replace usages of "UtcNow" in DatabaseOperations.cs #56442
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Quarantine CacheTagHelper_VaryByCultureComposesWithOtherVaryByOptions #56441
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview7
  • Skip Templates.Mvc.Tests in Helix on Debian12 and Mariner #56291
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview7
  • Revert "Skip some Razor build tests to observe effect on test runner" #56343
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview7
  • Fix check for form parameters that don't need complex binding in RDG #56332
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 9.0-preview7
  • Use IProblemDetailService in ValidationProblem #51464
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Set the baggage even when the trace id is not successfully extracted #55341
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Perf: ReasonPhrases as FrozenDictionary instead of Dictionary #56304
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Quarantine CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #56300
    area-blazor, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Fix up nullability and primitive type handing in schema generation #56372
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • [release/8.0] Don't require latest runtime patch for Blazor DevServer #56181
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Use ArgumentOutOfRangeException Throw methods in SendFileResponseExtensions..CheckRange #56420
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Use JSON source generator in WebApplicationFactory #55595
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview6
